body:
https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/post/4qe6/ruqqus-222-politics-filter

Every single time there's any major post, I'm always way too late to try and join the discussion. But somehow literally *everyone else* knows about it the millisecond it's posted, and posts their comments in a flash if they have anything to say. Is there some kind of notification system that I don't have enabled?

body: They're browsing New all day, in their time zone anyway. I am in Europe and Ruqqus is quieter during my mornings but it picks up activity as US comes online. It may be that you are on Ruqqus outside of its busy hours and missing out during prime time.

body: I don't think anyone just stares at the screen and keeps refreshing new from dawn to dusk. And a lot of these are admin posts, and they're not always posted at the same time, and I am on during the busy hours. Yet the same people are always there immediately. I wonder if the admins tell certain people ahead of time or right afterwards for some reason.

body:
It's too late to actually join the discussion though. If you comment any time after the first 20-30 minutes no one will even see it.

In any case, I've always had problems with a lot of other people doing insanely hard things like it's a cakewalk, and I never could. Since it's always the same people who show up first to these threads, this is probably one of those things and I was hoping someone who does could give me some answers.
body_html:
It's too late to actually join the discussion though. If you comment any time after the first 20-30 minutes no one will even see it.

In any case, I've always had problems with a lot of other people doing insanely hard things like it's a cakewalk, and I never could. Since it's always the same people who show up first to these threads, this is probably one of those things and I was hoping someone who does could give me some answers.

body: True, but who checks every single discord message (I barely use it and even I get too many). Plus I know for a fact that many of these people aren't online 24/7, in fact some of them are online even less often than they are offline. But they always show up to these threads within literally < 5 minutes every single time. Discord also doesn't explain it because this also happens with regular meta threads that explode, which wouldn't be posted in #announcements or stickied to the top of ruqqus immediately, yet these same users are still always the first ones to know about it. One of them is also the author of these posts way more often than other users.
